lines.text: Demons aren't real. Theyre parables, metaphors.

[as the doors open and Pinhead enters]
Then what the fuck is that?
There is no good, Monroe. There is no evil. There is only flesh.
If you have a quality, be proud of it. Let it define you, whatever it is.
Human dreams... such fertile ground for the seeds of torment. You're so ripe Joey, and it's harvest time.

[crying]
But this isn't fair! You can't!
Save your tears. I'll reap your sorrow slowly. I have centuries to discover the things that make you whimper.
You bastard! You invaded my mind!
You think your nighttime world is closed to me? Your mind is so naked. A book that yearns to be read. A door that begs to be opened.
Jesus Christ!
Not quite.

[to Joey]
I will enjoy making you bleed. And I will enjoy making you enjoy it.
You'll burn in hell for this!
Burn? Oh, such a limited imagination!
Just give me the box and I'll free you from the future.
Free yourself from the past.

[shouting]
Don't debate with me, girl! Just come here and die while you still have the option of doing it quickly!
This is my body, This is my blood, Happy are they who come to my supper.
Unbearable, isn't it? The suffering of strangers, the agony of friends. There is a secret song at the center of the world, Joey, and its sound is like razors through flesh.
I don't believe you.
Oh come, you can hear its faint echo right now. I'm here to turn up the volume. To press the stinking face of humanity into the dark blood of its own secret heart.
Down the dark decades of your pain, this will seem like a memory of Heaven.
[first lines]

[referring to the Pillar of Souls]
You want it?

[laughs]
Is it yours?
No. Not mine. Yours.
How much you want for it?
Whatever you think it's worth.
[receives money]
Exactly the figure I had in mind. Take pleasure in it.
Complete the pattern, solve the puzzle, turn the key.

[after exploding through the door of J.P.'s upstairs room and descending the stairs to meet the bar's unsuspecting patrons]
Shall we begin?
Shit! Gasoline!
I am offering you a place at my right hand - flesh, power, dominion.
Relax, baby. This is better than sex.
Thou shall not bow down before any graven image.
Now, can we talk sensibly?
Hell has no furies for a woman scorned.

[laughs maniacally and evil]
Why resist? You love this as much as I. After all, you made me. There is a world out there, waiting to yield to us. So much flesh, so many different pleasures.

[mocking the Crucifixion of Christ]
I am the way!

[after being transformed into a Cenobite]
I can dream now, Joey. Oh, you wouldn't believe what I can dream of now.
Oh, Doc. No.
Have you seen what he did to me, you little bitch? Have you seen?
[last lines]
Go to hell!
By helping me you will help yourself.
